markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wet Shock Snare](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1279)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Electricity" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=56" />
<trait label="Mechanical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=105" />
<trait label="Snare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=146" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 27</row>

**Price** 25 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A hidden copper plate conceals a bag of electric eels. When a creature steps on the plate, the eels become agitated, and the creature takes 4d8 electricity damage (DC 21 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). On a critical failure, the current causes the creature to become [stunned 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36). The eels are unharmed after use, but the mechanism is broken as usual for snares.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Wet Shock Snare
